channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tech’s 2024 winners and losers—from Elon Musk to GM’s Cruise
item.description: Elon Musk came out on top of the tech heap in 2024.

item.title: Apple poised to cross $4 trillion threshold
item.description: Apple stock has risen 40% this year, largely on the promise of AI improvements to iPhone.

item.title: Israeli Military Forces Patients and Staff to Leave Hospital in Northern Gaza
item.description: The hospital, Kamal Adwan, has been caught in the middle of Israel’s offensive against Hamas militants in northern Gaza.

item.title: Richard Parsons, who led Time Warner and Citigroup, dies at 76
item.description: “Dick was an American original, a colossus bestriding the worlds of business, media, culture, philanthropy, and beyond,” Ronald Lauder said.

item.title: 7 in 10 Americans say healthcare denials and insurance company profits carry some blame in CEO’s death
item.description: Younger Americans are particularly likely to see the murder as the result of a confluence of forces rather than just one person's action.
